parameters.name: SelectedSubscriptions
parameters.label: Subscription
parameters.query: AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions' | project subscriptionId = SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s | distinct subscriptionId, SubscriptionName | order by SubscriptionName asc

content.query:
AzureOptimizationVMsV1_CL | where todatetime(TimeGenerated) > ago(1d) | extend ResourceType = 'VMs' | summarize TileValue=count() by ResourceType
| union ( AzureOptimizationDisksV1_CL | where todatetime(TimeGenerated) > ago(1d) | extend ResourceType = 'Managed Disks' | summarize TileValue=count() by ResourceType )
| union ( AzureOptimizationVhdDisksV1_CL | where todatetime(TimeGenerated) > ago(1d) | extend ResourceType = 'VHDs' | summarize TileValue=count() by ResourceType )
| union ( AzureOptimizationVNetsV1_CL | where todatetime(TimeGenerated) > ago(1d) | distinct InstanceId_s | extend ResourceType = 'VNets' | summarize TileValue=count() by ResourceType )
| union ( AzureOptimizationVNetsV1_CL | where todatetime(TimeGenerated) > ago(1d) | extend ResourceType = 'Subnets' | summarize TileValue=count() by ResourceType )
| union ( AzureOptimizationNICsV1_CL | where todatetime(TimeGenerated) > ago(1d) | distinct InstanceId_s | extend ResourceType = 'NICs' | summarize TileValue=count() by ResourceType )
| union ( AzureOptimizationLoadBalancersV1_CL | where todatetime(TimeGenerated) > ago(1d) | extend ResourceType = 'Load Balancers' | summarize TileValue=count() by ResourceType )
| union ( AzureOptimizationAppGatewaysV1_CL | where todatetime(TimeGenerated) > ago(1d) | extend ResourceType = 'App GWs' | summarize TileValue=count() by ResourceType )
| union ( AzureOptimizationPublicIPsV1_CL | where todatetime(TimeGenerated) > ago(1d) | extend ResourceType = 'Public IPs' | summarize TileValue=count() by ResourceType )
| union ( AzureOptimizationNSGsV1_CL | where todatetime(TimeGenerated) > ago(1d) | distinct InstanceId_s | extend ResourceType = 'NSGs' | summarize TileValue=count() by ResourceType )
| project ResourceType, TileValue
content.title: Total Resources (today)

content.query: AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions' | extend SubscriptionType = tostring(parse_json(ContainerProperties_s).subscriptionPolicies.quotaId) | summarize count() by SubscriptionType, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Subscriptions by Type

content.query: AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions' | extend ManagementGroup = tostring(parse_json(ContainerProperties_s).managementGroupAncestorsChain[0].displayName) | summarize count() by ManagementGroup, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Subscriptions by Management Group

content.query: AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions/resourcegroups' | project InstanceId_s, SubscriptionGuid_g, todatetime(StatusDate_s) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | summarize count() by SubscriptionName, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Resource Groups by Subscription

content.query: AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions' | summarize sum(toint(ResourceCount_s)) by ContainerName_s, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Resources by Subscription

content.query: AzureOptimizationRBACAssignmentsV1_CL | where TimeGenerated > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and Model_s == 'AzureRM' and Scope_s startswith '/subscriptions/' | extend SubscriptionGuid_g = tostring(split(Scope_s, '/')[2]) | where SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner (AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions' | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName) on SubscriptionGuid_g | summarize count() by SubscriptionName, bin(TimeGenerated, 1d) | render timechart
content.title: RBAC Assignments by Subscription

content.query: AzureOptimizationRBACAssignmentsV1_CL | where TimeGenerated > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and Model_s == 'AzureRM' and Scope_s has 'managementGroups' | extend ManagementGroupId = tostring(split(Scope_s, '/')[4]) | summarize count() by ManagementGroupId, bin(TimeGenerated, 1d) | render timechart
content.title: RBAC Assignments by Management Group

content.query: AzureOptimizationVMsV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | summarize count() by SubscriptionName, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: VMs by Subscription

content.query: AzureOptimizationDisksV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | union (     AzureOptimizationVhdDisksV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) ) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | summarize count() by SubscriptionName, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Disks by Subscription

content.query: AzureOptimizationVNetsV1_CL | distinct InstanceId_s, SubscriptionGuid_g, StatusDate_s | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | summarize count() by SubscriptionName, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: VNets by Subscription

content.query: AzureOptimizationVNetsV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | summarize count() by SubscriptionName, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Subnets by Subscription

content.query: AzureOptimizationLoadBalancersV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | summarize count() by SubscriptionName, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Load Balancers by Subscription

content.query: AzureOptimizationAppGatewaysV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | summarize count() by SubscriptionName, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Application Gateways by Subscription

content.query: AzureOptimizationNICsV1_CL | distinct InstanceId_s, SubscriptionGuid_g, StatusDate_s | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | summarize count() by SubscriptionName, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: NICs by Subscription

content.query: AzureOptimizationPublicIPsV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | summarize count() by SubscriptionName, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Public IPs by Subscription

content.query: AzureOptimizationNSGsV1_CL | distinct InstanceId_s, SubscriptionGuid_g, StatusDate_s | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | summarize count() by SubscriptionName, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: NSGs by Subscription

content.query: AzureOptimizationNSGsV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | summarize count() by SubscriptionName, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: NSG Rules by Subscription

content.query: AzureOptimizationVMsV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | summarize count() by Location_s, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: VMs by Region

content.query: AzureOptimizationDisksV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | union (     AzureOptimizationVhdDisksV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) ) | summarize count() by Location_s, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Disks by Region

content.query: AzureOptimizationVNetsV1_CL | distinct InstanceId_s, SubscriptionGuid_g, Location_s, StatusDate_s | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | summarize count() by Location_s, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: VNets by Region

content.query: AzureOptimizationVNetsV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | summarize count() by Location_s, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Subnets by Region

content.query: AzureOptimizationLoadBalancersV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | summarize count() by Location_s, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Load Balancers by Region

content.query: AzureOptimizationAppGatewaysV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | summarize count() by Location_s, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Application Gateways by Region

content.query: AzureOptimizationNICsV1_CL | distinct InstanceId_s, SubscriptionGuid_g, Location_s, StatusDate_s | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | summarize count() by Location_s, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: NICs by Region

content.query: AzureOptimizationPublicIPsV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | summarize count() by Location_s, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Public IPs by Region

content.query: AzureOptimizationNSGsV1_CL | distinct InstanceId_s, SubscriptionGuid_g, Location_s, StatusDate_s | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | summarize count() by Location_s, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: NSGs by Region

content.query: AzureOptimizationVMsV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | summarize sum(toint(CoresCount_s)) by SubscriptionName, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Cores by Subscription

content.query: AzureOptimizationVMsV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | summarize sum(toint(CoresCount_s)) by Location_s, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Cores by Region

content.query: AzureOptimizationVMsV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | summarize count() by tolower(VMSize_s), bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: VMs by Size

content.query: AzureOptimizationVMsV1_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d) and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | extend Size = tolower(VMSize_s) | summarize count() by Size | order by count_
content.title: VMs by Size

content.query: AzureOptimizationDisksV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | union (     AzureOptimizationVhdDisksV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) ) | extend SKU = tolower(iif(isnotempty(SKU_s), SKU_s, 'Unsupported')) | summarize count() by SKU, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Disks by SKU

content.query: AzureOptimizationDisksV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | union (     AzureOptimizationVhdDisksV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) ) | summarize count() by DeploymentModel_s, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Disks by Model

content.query: AzureOptimizationDisksV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | union (     AzureOptimizationVhdDisksV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) ) | extend DiskType = iif(isnotempty(DiskType_s), DiskType_s, 'NotAvailable') | summarize count() by DiskType, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Disks by Type

content.query: AzureOptimizationDisksV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | union (     AzureOptimizationVhdDisksV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) ) | extend Caching = iif(isnotempty(Caching_s), Caching_s, 'NotAvailable') | summarize count() by Caching, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Disks by Caching

content.query: AzureOptimizationDisksV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) and isempty(OwnerVMId_s) | union (     AzureOptimizationVhdDisksV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) and isempty(OwnerVMId_s) ) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | summarize count() by SubscriptionName, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Unattached Disks by Subscription

content.query: AzureOptimizationDisksV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | union (     AzureOptimizationVhdDisksV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) ) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | summarize sum(toint(DiskSizeGB_s)/1024) by SubscriptionName, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Total Disks Size (TB) by Subscription

content.query: AzureOptimizationVMsV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | summarize count() by OSType_s, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: VMs by OS Type

content.query: AzureOptimizationVMsV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | extend PowerState = iif(isnotempty(PowerState_s), iif(PowerState_s has 'PowerState', tostring(split(PowerState_s, '/')[1]), PowerState_s), 'Unsupported') | summarize count() by PowerState, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: VMs by Power State

content.query: AzureOptimizationVMsV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | extend OSModel = iif(isnotempty(OSName_s), strcat(OSName_s, "_", OSVersion_s), 'NotAvailable/NotRunning') | summarize count() by OSModel, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: VMs by OS Model

content.query: AzureOptimizationVMsV1_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d) and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | extend OSModel = iif(isnotempty(OSName_s), strcat(OSName_s, "_", OSVersion_s), 'NotAvailable/NotRunning') | summarize count() by OSModel | order by count_
content.title: VMs by OS Model

content.query: AzureOptimizationVMsV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | extend ImageModel = iif(isnotempty(ImageOffer_s), iif(ImageOffer_s startswith '/', strcat("Custom_", ImageOffer_s), strcat(ImageOffer_s, "_", ImageSku_s)), 'NotAvailable') | summarize count() by ImageModel, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: VMs by Image Model

content.query: AzureOptimizationVMsV1_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d) and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | extend ImageModel = iif(isnotempty(ImageOffer_s), iif(ImageOffer_s startswith '/', strcat("Custom_", ImageOffer_s), strcat(ImageOffer_s, "_", ImageSku_s)), 'NotAvailable') | summarize count() by ImageModel | order by count_
content.title: VMs by Image Model

content.query: AzureOptimizationVMsV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | extend DiskType = iif(UsesManagedDisks_s == 'true', 'Managed', 'Unmanaged') | summarize count() by DiskType, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: VMs by Disk Model

content.query: let VNetTotalIPs = AzureOptimizationVNetsV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | summarize SubnetCount=count() by InstanceId_s, VNetPrefixes_s, StatusDate_s | extend AddressSpace = split(VNetPrefixes_s, ' ') | mvexpand AddressSpace | extend TotalIPs = pow(2, 32 - toint(split(tostring(AddressSpace), '/')[1])) | summarize VNetIPs=sum(TotalIPs) by InstanceId_s, SubnetCount, StatusDate_s | extend TotalVNetIPs = VNetIPs - (5*SubnetCount) | summarize by TotalVNetIPs, InstanceId_s, StatusDate_s; AzureOptimizationVNetsV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner ( AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions' | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | join kind=inner ( VNetTotalIPs ) on InstanceId_s, StatusDate_s | summarize UsedIPs=sum(toint(SubnetUsedIPs_s)) by InstanceId_s, VNetName_s, TotalVNetIPs, SubscriptionName, StatusDate_s | extend VNet = strcat(VNetName_s, '_', SubscriptionName), AvailableIPs = TotalVNetIPs - UsedIPs | summarize by VNet, AvailableIPs, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Available IPs by VNet

content.query: let VNetTotalIPs = AzureOptimizationVNetsV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | summarize SubnetCount=count() by InstanceId_s, VNetPrefixes_s, StatusDate_s | extend AddressSpace = split(VNetPrefixes_s, ' ') | mvexpand AddressSpace | extend TotalIPs = pow(2, 32 - toint(split(tostring(AddressSpace), '/')[1])) | summarize VNetIPs=sum(TotalIPs) by InstanceId_s, SubnetCount, StatusDate_s | extend TotalVNetIPs = VNetIPs - (5*SubnetCount) | summarize by TotalVNetIPs, InstanceId_s, StatusDate_s; AzureOptimizationVNetsV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner ( AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions' | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | join kind=inner ( VNetTotalIPs ) on InstanceId_s, StatusDate_s | summarize UsedIPs=sum(toint(SubnetUsedIPs_s)) by InstanceId_s, VNetName_s, TotalVNetIPs, SubscriptionName, StatusDate_s | extend VNet = strcat(VNetName_s, '_', SubscriptionName), IPUsagePercentage = todouble(UsedIPs) / todouble(TotalVNetIPs) * 100 | summarize by VNet, IPUsagePercentage, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: IP Usage % by VNet

content.query: AzureOptimizationVNetsV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner ( AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions' | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | extend Subnet = strcat(VNetName_s, '_', SubnetName_s, '_', SubscriptionName), IPUsagePercentage = todouble(SubnetUsedIPs_s) / todouble(SubnetTotalPrefixIPs_s) * 100 | where IPUsagePercentage > 70 | summarize by Subnet, IPUsagePercentage, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Subnets over 70% IP Usage

content.query: AzureOptimizationVNetsV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner ( AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions' | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | distinct InstanceId_s, VNetName_s, StatusDate_s, SubscriptionName, PeeringsCount_s | extend VNet = strcat(VNetName_s, '_', SubscriptionName), Peerings = toint(PeeringsCount_s) | summarize by VNet, Peerings, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Peerings by VNet

content.query: AzureOptimizationVNetsV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner ( AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions' | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | summarize TotalUsedIPs=sum(toint(SubnetUsedIPs_s)) by InstanceId_s, VNetName_s, SubscriptionName, StatusDate_s | where TotalUsedIPs == 0 | summarize count() by SubscriptionName, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Unused VNets by Subscription

content.query: AzureOptimizationVNetsV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner ( AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions' | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | where SubnetUsedIPs_s == 0 | extend VNet = strcat(VNetName_s, '_', SubscriptionName) | summarize count() by VNet, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Unused subnets by VNet

content.query: AzureOptimizationLoadBalancersV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | extend SKU = strcat(SkuName_s,'_',SkuTier_s) | summarize count() by SKU, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Load Balancers by SKU

content.query: AzureOptimizationLoadBalancersV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | summarize count() by LbType_s, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Load Balancers by Type

content.query: AzureOptimizationLoadBalancersV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | where (toint(BackendPoolsCount_s) == 0 or BackendIPCount_s == 0 or isempty(BackendIPCount_s)) and toint(InboundNatPoolsCount_s) == 0 | summarize count() by SubscriptionName, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Unused Load Balancers by Subscription

content.query: AzureOptimizationAppGatewaysV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | summarize count() by SkuName_s, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Application Gateways by SKU

content.query: AzureOptimizationAppGatewaysV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | summarize count() by SkuName_s, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Application Gateways by SKU

content.query: AzureOptimizationAppGatewaysV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | summarize sum(toint(SkuCapacity_s)) by SubscriptionName, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Capacity by Subscription

content.query: AzureOptimizationAppGatewaysV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | summarize sum(toint(SkuCapacity_s)) by Location_s, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Capacity by Region

content.query: AzureOptimizationAppGatewaysV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | summarize sum(toint(SkuCapacity_s)) by SkuName_s, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Capacity by SKU

content.query: AzureOptimizationAppGatewaysV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | where toint(BackendPoolsCount_s) == 0 or toint(BackendIPCount_s) == 0 or isempty(BackendIPCount_s) | summarize count() by SubscriptionName, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Unused Application Gateways by Subscription

content.query: AzureOptimizationNICsV1_CL | distinct InstanceId_s, SubscriptionGuid_g, StatusDate_s, EnableAcceleratedNetworking_s | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | extend AcceleratedNetworking = iif(tobool(EnableAcceleratedNetworking_s), 'Enabled', 'Disabled') | summarize count() by AcceleratedNetworking, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: NICs by Accelerated Networking Enabled

content.query: AzureOptimizationNICsV1_CL | distinct InstanceId_s, SubscriptionGuid_g, StatusDate_s, PrivateIPAllocationMethod_s | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | summarize count() by PrivateIPAllocationMethod_s, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: NICs by Allocation Method

content.query: AzureOptimizationNICsV1_CL | where isnotempty(PublicIPId_s) | distinct InstanceId_s, SubscriptionGuid_g, StatusDate_s | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | summarize count() by SubscriptionName, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: NICs with Public IP by Subscription

content.query: AzureOptimizationNICsV1_CL | where isempty(OwnerPEId_s) and isempty(OwnerVMId_s) | distinct InstanceId_s, SubscriptionGuid_g, StatusDate_s | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | summarize count() by SubscriptionName, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Unattached NICs by Subscription

content.query: AzureOptimizationPublicIPsV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | extend SKU = iif(isnotempty(SkuName_s), strcat(SkuTier_s, '_', SkuName_s), 'classic') | summarize count() by SKU, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Public IPs by SKU

content.query: AzureOptimizationPublicIPsV1_CL | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | summarize count() by AllocationMethod_s, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Public IPs by Allocation Method

content.query: AzureOptimizationPublicIPsV1_CL | where isempty(AssociatedResourceId_s) | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | summarize count() by SubscriptionName, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Unattached Public IPs by Subscription

content.query: AzureOptimizationNSGsV1_CL | where toint(SubnetCount_s) > 0 or toint(NicCount_s) > 0 | distinct InstanceId_s, SubscriptionGuid_g, StatusDate_s, SubnetCount_s, NicCount_s | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | extend UsageMode = iif(toint(SubnetCount_s) > 0, iif(toint(NicCount_s) > 0, 'Subnet+NIC', 'Subnet'), 'NIC') | summarize count() by UsageMode, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: NSGs by Usage Mode

content.query: AzureOptimizationNSGsV1_CL | where toint(SubnetCount_s) == 0 and toint(NicCount_s) == 0 | distinct InstanceId_s, SubscriptionGuid_g, StatusDate_s | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value}) | join kind=inner (     AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL     | where todatetime(StatusDate_s) > datetime('{ResourcesTimeRange:startISO}') and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})     | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'     | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s     | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName ) on SubscriptionGuid_g | summarize count() by SubscriptionName, bin(todatetime(StatusDate_s), 1d) | render timechart
content.title: Unused NSGs by Subscription
